name: 張文忠
objective: 本課程將講述生物醫學工程相關之基礎知識，包括人體結構、基礎生理學、生醫材料、生物力學、醫學電子、醫療器材、組織工程、生醫檢測等方面之概念
schedule:
週次   單元主題
 1.    Introduction of biomedical engineering 
 2.    Structures of biomaterials
 3.    Properties of biomaterials
 4.    Biocompatibility of biomaterials
 5.    國慶日放假
 6.    Biomedical application of biomaterials
 7.    Tissue engineering
 8.    Biosensing
 9.    Midterm exam
 10.   Biotechnology
 11.   Hemodynamics
 12.   Mass transfer in tissue structure
 13.   Biomechanics
 14.   Biomedical signal processing
 15.   Final oral presentations (I)
 16.   Final oral presentations (II)
 17.   Final oral presentations (III)
 18.   Final exam
scorePolicy:
期中考: 30% 
期末考: 40% 
期末報告及平時表現: 30%
materials:
1.”Introduction to Biomedical Engineering”, Enderle et al.,Academic Press  
2.”Basic Transport Phenomena in Biomedical Engineering” R.L. Fournier, Taylor and Francis, Chapters 5 and 6.
3.”Biomaterials Science, An Introduction to Materials in Medicine,” edited by Buddy.
4.”生物醫學材料” 王盈錦主編, 合記出版社.
5.”醫學工程原理與應用”王正一主編, 正中書局.
